title: best options for ping other than oce for and oce
body:
i started on na before season one started playing again oct last year 
i play oce and na now but i have all runes and champs yes i need to improve but i think why not improve while leveling another account on a diff server
what ever for somebody in oce would give a half decent ping other than na which is around 180 oce i get 25

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Scroto Saggins,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RwVN2opo,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-24T04:48:23.835+0000)
 i think why not improve while leveling another account on a diff server

Because of a higher ping you'll have to put up with?

30-50 ping on OCE would only increase to about 55-80 ping on Garena.  Maybe a bit more.

Still better than the 180-250ms I used to get on NA.

> [{quoted}](name=A Blue Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RwVN2opo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-24T05:12:10.551+0000)
>
> 30-50 ping on OCE would only increase to about 55-80 ping on Garena.  Maybe a bit more.
> 
> Still better than the 180-250ms I used to get on NA.

is garena an offical server ?

Official? Yes. Riot owned and operated? No.

Everything is exactly the same except it's independent of Riot. I'm pretty sure the only difference is that you have to make a Garena account instead of your normal LoL account.

> [{quoted}](name=Scroto Saggins,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RwVN2opo,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-24T05:28:28.131+0000)
>
> is garena an offical server ?

IDK how Garena works but I think getting an account there might be vastly different because it is a different company in charge of LoL over there.
